title: A machine that removes weeds without damaging crops

tasks.task: The speaker demonstrates how to use a disc harrow on a farm.
subtasks: Lift the disc harrow onto the farm vehicle.
Guide the disc harrow to the field.
Operate the controls to lower the disc harrow into the soil.
Monitor the depth of the disc harrow as it turns the soil.
Adjust the depth of the discs if necessary during operation.
Check the ground coverage to ensure even soil disturbance.
Monitor the direction of the disc harrow to avoid uneven passes.
Oversee the turning of the soil to prepare it for planting.

tasks.task: The speaker describes driving the farm vehicle.
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat of the farm vehicle.
Adjust the seat and mirrors for optimal visibility and comfort.
Engage the transmission and start the vehicle engine.
Drive the vehicle onto the field, paying attention to speed and direction.
Navigate around obstacles or uneven terrain on the field.
Stop the vehicle when necessary, such as at the edge of the field or to make adjustments.

tasks.task: The speaker explains adjusting the disc depth.
subtasks: Identify the mechanism or switch that controls the disc depth.
Disengage the discs if necessary to adjust the depth.
Move the adjustment lever or wheel to the desired position.
Re-engage the discs and verify the new depth setting.
Monitor the depth as the disc harrow operates, checking for consistency.

tasks.task: The speaker assesses the ground coverage and evenness.
subtasks: Observe the field as the disc harrow passes over it.
Check for areas where the soil is being turned more deeply.
Adjust the harrow if uneven coverage is detected.
Inspect the soil to ensure there are no clumps or missed spots.
Check that the discs are cutting through the soil uniformly.

tasks.task: The speaker oversees the turning of the soil.
subtasks: Operator is at the controls of the disc harrow attachment.
Monitor the direction and path of the disc harrow.
Ensure that the soil is being turned and incorporated properly.
Check for any resistance or binding in the discs.
Check that the furrows created by the discs are of the right depth and spacing.

tasks.task: The speaker describes starting the farm vehicle.
subtasks: Approach the farm vehicle and open the driver's side door.
Step into the seat and position the seat and mirrors.
Close the door and turn the key in the ignition.
Press the starter button to start the vehicle engine.
Wait for the engine to reach operating speed.
